rows.label: qev051004_MSG0001
rows.name:
Your swords are masterworks all, sir!
I refuse to believe this one a failure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0002
rows.name: ...So please calm down and don't kill me! Pleeeeease![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0003
rows.name:
My master is a bit unusual, but you will not find a
more accomplished Wrothian blacksmith.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0004
rows.name:
Even the Ganglion respected his skillsâ€”they let him
keep working his forge as a special exception.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0005
rows.name:
I am eager to see the sort of sword such a master
smith would dream about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0006
rows.name:
Master! What should my mental state be as I approach
the anvil?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0007
rows.name: Teach me, sir! Shape me as you would hot steel![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0008
rows.name:
I wonder what trials and tribulations my master has
overcome in life that have instilled in him the consuming
passion and love he feels for bladesmithing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0009
rows.name:
I expect it is more than an inexperienced whelp like me
could even imagine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0010
rows.name:
At last it is real... The unbreakable sword!
My master departed for Cauldros to test its edge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051004_MSG0011
rows.name:
Please go and meet him there. Bear witness both to his
bravery in combat, and to the unparalleled quality of
his masterwork.[ST:wait ]
